Motivation: Push yourself, because no one else is going to do it for you.
The harder you work for something, the greater you'll feel when you achieve it.
Don’t stop when you’re tired. Stop when you’re done.
Success: Success is not in what you have, but who you are.
Don't watch the clock; do what it does. Keep going.
Success usually comes to those who are too busy to be looking for it.
Perseverance: It always seems impossible until it’s done.
Perseverance is not a long race; it's many short races one after the other.
Fall seven times, stand up eight.
Leadership: Leadership is the capacity to translate vision into reality.
A leader is one who knows the way, goes the way, and shows the way.
The function of leadership is to produce more leaders, not more followers.
Innovation: Innovation distinguishes between a leader and a follower.
The best way to predict the future is to invent it.
Creativity is thinking up new things. Innovation is doing new things.
